p: Most of the top 14 compounds are cyclic sesquiterpenes, except the 6 which is a cyclic monoterpene. Sesquiterpenes are among the main classes of secondary metabolites with antiviral properties (Reichling 2018). These compounds had been tested against different herpesviruses, rhinovirus and hepatitis B (Astani et al. 2011; Gu et al. 2019).
